html:
Dec 21 (Reuters) - Casino Sa CASP.PA:

  • REG-CASINO GROUP AND GREENYELLOW ANNOUNCE STRATEGIC COLLABORATION ON ENERGY AND CLOUD WITH AMAZON WEB SERVICES

  • REG-CASINO GROUP AND GREENYELLOW ANNOUNCE STRATEGIC COLLABORATION ON ENERGY AND CLOUD WITH AMAZON WEB SERVICES

  • COMPANIES WILL CONTINUE TO EVALUATE OTHER RENEWABLE PROJECTS IN FRANCE AND ACROSS EUROPE

  • AMAZON WEB SERVICES (AWS) WILL SUPPORT CASINO GROUP ON ITS DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION

  • DEAL HIGHLIGHTS GREENYELLOW'S ABILITY TO PROVIDE RENEWABLE ENERGY FOR POWER NEEDS OF LARGE COMPANIES OPERATING IN FRANCE

  • RENEWABLE ELECTRICITY PURCHASED UNDER PPA WILL HELP SUPPORT AMAZON'S COMMITMENT TO POWER ITS GLOBAL OPERATIONS WITH 100% RENEWABLE ENERGY AS PART OF ITS CLIMATE PLEDGE COMMITMENT TO REACH NET-ZERO CARBON BY 2040-10 YEARS AHEAD OF PARIS AGREEMENT

  • : GREENYELLOW WILL SUPPLY RENEWABLE ELECTRICITY FOR AMAZON'S OPERATIONS.

  • UNDER THIS COLLABORATION, CASINO GROUP AND ITS SUBSIDIARY GREENYELLOW WILL BENEFIT FROM AWS CLOUD SERVICES FUELED WITH GREEN ENERGY

  • AMAZON WEB SERVICES (AWS) WILL SUPPORT CASINO GROUP ON ITS DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION.

  • AWS WILL ALSO WORK WITH RELEVANC, GROUP'S SUBSIDIARY SPECIALIZING IN DATA MARKETING SOLUTIONS, TO DEVELOP ALGORITHMS TO FURTHER ENHANCE CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE

  • THE COMPANIES WILL CONTINUE TO EVALUATE OTHER RENEWABLE PROJECTS IN FRANCE AND ACROSS EUROPE

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: CASP.PA


(Reporting by Sudip Kar-Gupta)
